summary: Provides a collection of helper classes and functions used by the upstream plugin to process HTTP requests, generate and manipulate HTML markup, manage caching, retrieve various Open Library data (such as changes, recent activity, blog feeds, edition configuration, and markdown), and render templates for the web interface.
business_intent: Enable the upstream component of Open Library to efficiently fetch, format, cache, and present data to endâ€‘users and downstream services, supporting features like change feeds, recent activity displays, and content rendering.
